attributes.name: EVO 2025 - Street Fighter 6
attributes.rules:
## EVO 2025 Street Fighter 6 Rules

### Tournament Format
- **Pools:** Best of 3 (BO3)
- **Top 8:** Best of 5 (BO5)
- **Grand Finals:** Extended set if needed

### Character Selection
- All characters are legal
- Winner must keep same character
- Loser may switch character

### Stage Selection
- All tournament legal stages available
- Random stage selection for game 1
- Loser picks stage for subsequent games

### Equipment
- Tournament provided controllers available
- Personal controllers must be inspected
- Wireless controllers prohibited
